statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{x^{3} - 11 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x , -3 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + x - 6 , -6 \, x^{3} - x - 3 , 2 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 3 , -6 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 6\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
